title: Sequelize Data Types
post: You can use data types such as INTEGER and STRING to define Sequelize models

title: Jest
post: Using the npm package Jest, you can run tests on your code to make sure that it is working properly

title: Path
post: By requiring path into your main code, you can set a default folder that your application will use for all of its components

title: Hashing
post: For security hashing is used when creating a password, which converts the given string to an encrypted string, which can be converted back within the program for verification

title: Express
post: Using Express.js, you can create a server in javascript.
